name: Mini Knights
description:
Mini Knights is a 2D fast paced 2-player battle game. Players battle in arenas and try to knock the other player off of the map as many times as they can. 

-CONTROLS-

Blue Knight (p1):
    - A and D to move
    - W to jump
    - S to raise shield (block)
    - F to attack

Red Knight (p2):
    - left and right arrow keys to move
    - up arrow to jump
    - down arrow to raise shield (block)
    - L to attack

Each player can double jump, attack, and block. When a player gets hit, they will be knocked backwards. If they have their shield raised and are facing the attack, they will only get pushed back a little bit. 

-FEATURES-

    - A title screen
    - 3 different arenas to fight in, each with their own special mechanic
    - A training map to mess around in
    - A very epic game.
